headline: Trump Ends the ‘De Minimis’ Tax Exemption Globally. What It Means for Retail Stocks.
summary: President Donald Trump broadly ended the de minimis exemption that allowed people to buy low-value imported items without paying duty and import taxes.  Trump said he was ending the exemption to close a loophole that allowed people to evade tariffs and funnel deadly synthetic opioids to the U.S. market.  Trump claims shippers have been exploiting the de minimis exemption because such packages typically draw less scrutiny.

raw.headline: Trump Ends the ‘De Minimis’ Tax Exemption Globally. What It Means for Retail Stocks.

Trump said he was ending the exemption to close a loophole that allowed people to evade tariffs and funnel deadly synthetic opioids to the U.S. market.  Trump claims shippers have been exploiting the de minimis exemption because such packages typically draw less scrutiny.

headline: FedEx and UPS Shares Fall After White House Sets End Date for ‘De Minimis’ Rule
summary: Shares of UPS and FedEx slid Wednesday after the White House said that the U.S. would end the de minimis rule that has allowed packages worth $800 or less to be imported duty-free.  It had already halted the practice for Chinese goods in May.  Shares of FedEx fell 4.6% and shares of UPS were down 4%.

headline: How Should Investors Approach UPS Stock Post Q2 Earnings Miss?
summary: United Parcel Service stock plunges after a Q2 earnings miss, with volume declines, tariff pressures, and no full-year guidance adding to uncertainty.

headline: UPS’s Lead Over FedEx in Market Value Shrinks to Narrowest Ever

headline: First-Time Business Owners Open New PostalAnnex Location in Lafayette, Louisiana
summary: Annex Brands, Inc., one of the leading franchisors in the packing, shipping and office services industries, is proud to announce the opening of its newest PostalAnnex location in Lafayette, LA to owners Shane and Chrissi Broussard. This new PostalAnnex is set to offer a wide range of essential services to the community, including shipping, mailbox rentals, and office services.
